controls.label: Does your reporting entity provide a designated service listed in the exemption tables and qualify for exemption under the specified AML/CTF Act or AML/CTF Rules references?
controls.detail-label: Which designated service(s) and exemption provision(s) apply to your entity?

controls.label: Does your entity have a documented procedure for handling cases where a customer cannot provide satisfactory evidence of identity in limited and exceptional circumstances?
controls.detail-label: Describe your procedure for handling customers who cannot provide satisfactory identity evidence (e.g., unregistered birth, homelessness, family violence, undocumented arrivals, remote areas, transgender/intersex persons, natural disasters, institutional/foster care background, limited social footprint, or restricted access due to government measures or COVID-19 precautions).

controls.label: Does your procedure specifically address cases where identity documents are unavailable due to government-implemented measures or reasonable measures to prevent COVID-19 spread?
controls.detail-label: How does your entity verify identity when customers are unable to provide documents due to government measures, self-isolation, business closures, office restrictions, or other COVID-19 precautions?
